[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/grid-tabulator](./grid-tabulator.md) &gt; [GridTabulatorCell](./grid-tabulator.gridtabulatorcell.md)

## GridTabulatorCell class

The GridTabulator Cell element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class GridTabulatorCell extends FoundationElement 
```
**Extends:** FoundationElement

## Remarks

Used inside the GridTabulator Column element to define a cell renderer from the template.
